title: paramapurusha
sahitya:
parama puruSa jagadIsha mAm pAhi pada bhaktim dEhi shrI rAma

anupallavi

 sarasija bhavamukha sura paripAla shrIdhara bhava nIradhi taraNA sundara caraNA

caraNam

 kOmala caraNA kaustubhAbharaNA sAmaja gamanA samunida vadanA mAmanO ranjana 
madaripu bhanjana rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata vinuta sucaraNA
